Package com.enttribe.hrms.repository

Interface JobApplicationRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<com.enttribe.hrms.model.JobApplication,Integer>, GenericRepository<com.enttribe.hrms.model.JobApplication>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<com.enttribe.hrms.model.JobApplication,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListCrudRepository<com.enttribe.hrms.model.JobApplication,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListPagingAndSortingRepository<com.enttribe.hrms.model.JobApplication,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<com.enttribe.hrms.model.JobApplication,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<com.enttribe.hrms.model.JobApplication>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<com.enttribe.hrms.model.JobApplication,Integer>
@Repository @Transactional(readOnly=true) public interface JobApplicationRepository extends GenericRepository<com.enttribe.hrms.model.JobApplication>
The JobApplicationRepository interface is a extension of GenericRepository. It's purpose is to provide additional methods that are specific to the JobApplication entity. see GenericRepository see JpaRepository

  • Method Details

    • findByApplicantId

      @Query(name="SELECT JA FROM JobApplication where applicant.id = ?1") com.enttribe.hrms.model.JobApplication findByApplicantId(Integer id)

    • reviewAndFillTheFeedbackFormForCandidate

      @Query(value="SELECT CONCAT(\'Review and fill out the feedback form for candidate&nbsp;<span class=\"highlighted-reminders-title\">\', ja.FIRST_NAME, \' \', ja.LAST_NAME, \'</span>\') as Result , a.UNIQUE_ID_CANDIDATE as applicantId , jb.JOB_ID FROM JOB_APPLICATION ja INNER JOIN APPLICANT a ON ja.APPLICANT_ID=a.ID INNER JOIN JOB_OPENING jb ON ja.JOB_OPENING_ID=jb.ID WHERE APPLICATION_STATUS=\'Offer planned\' AND DATE(ja.CREATED_TIME)=CURRENT_DATE;", nativeQuery=true) List<Object[]> reviewAndFillTheFeedbackFormForCandidate()

    • findByApplicantIdAndJobOpeningId

      @Query(value="SELECT * FROM JOB_APPLICATION WHERE APPLICANT_ID = :applicantId AND JOB_OPENING_ID = :jobOpeningId", nativeQuery=true) com.enttribe.hrms.model.JobApplication findByApplicantIdAndJobOpeningId(@Param("applicantId") int applicantId, @Param("jobOpeningId") int jobOpeningId)

    • findAllByApplicationStatus

      @Query(name="SELECT JA FROM JobApplication where JA.applicationStatus=:name") List<com.enttribe.hrms.model.JobApplication> findAllByApplicationStatus(@Param("name") String name)

    • getCountOfJobApplicationByDepartmentId

      @Query("SELECT count(*) FROM JobApplication j WHERE j.jobOpening.id IN (Select jo.id from JobOpening jo where jo.department.id = :departmentId)") Integer getCountOfJobApplicationByDepartmentId(Integer departmentId)

    • getCountOfJobApplicationByDepartmentId

      @Query("SELECT count(*) FROM JobApplication j WHERE j.jobOpening.id IN (Select jo.id from JobOpening jo where jo.department.id IN (:departmentIds))") Integer getCountOfJobApplicationByDepartmentId(List<Integer> departmentIds)
